alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 02 at 10:12PM PST until February 03 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Higher terrain within central Douglas County and eastern Douglas County Foothills. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills
